title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-7.26 - Living areas
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-7.26 - Living areas

State Regulations

No operation of a retail food store shall be conducted in
any room used as living or sleeping quarters. Retail food store operations
shall be separated from any living or sleeping quarters by complete
partitioning and solid, self-closing doors. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
§§
271-7.26

Repealed

New

York State Register June 22, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 25, eff. 6/22/2016

Adopted

New

York State Register December 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 51, eff. 12/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
